Name: 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》
About the game: 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》 A third-person-action game with a special emphasis on aerial-combat. Players need to utilize grappling hook and acrobatics to fight enemies, solve puzzles to progress through each level. Features Third-person fast-paced action Fluid animation and versatile control system Customizable hair options for Faye Physics based puzzle solving Parkour on whale! ヽ（・∀・）ノ Steep learning curve, very hardcore! Play with caution! Σ( ° △ °|||) Download 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》 demo and experience it yourself!
